summary: Baking
body:
Baking

It was a sunny Saturday afternoon and Tony and Peter were trying to bake cookies.

“Okay Mr Stark, this recipe says we need egg, vanilla extract, sugar, butter, baking powder, soda and flour.” Peter states matter o’ factually.

“I don’t even know if I have all of those ingredients kid.” Tony sighs.

“That’s why I brought some with me!” Peter exclaims excitedly. “Of course you did.” Tony chuckles.

Peter starts to get all the ingredients lied out on the kitchen counter and follows with getting all the necessary utensils and tools for the recipe. Tony couldn’t help but smile watching Peter work around the kitchen like he lives here. Tony watched him intently, watched when he needed to step on his tippy-toes to reach certain cupboards and his eyes trailed to his skin when his shirt rose up while doing so. Tony thought Peter was beautiful, and Peter is.

Peter snaps Tony out of his trance by calling his name.

“Hmm?” Tony asks.

“It’s time to start. Come on!” Peter says happily. How one had so much excitement for the baking of cookies, Tony did not know. “Okay, okay, start with creaming the butter and sugar together.” Peters says, handing Tony the ingredients and a bowl. Tony begins doing the task which was asked. “When the butter and sugar are mixed, add the egg and vanilla.” Peter continues, reading the recipe. “Pass the bowl, i’ll do it.”

Tony passes the bowl to Peter and Peter mixes the egg and vanilla. “Dry ingredients.” Peter remembers and begins to do just that.

After everything is mixed, Peter puffs and brushes the back of his palm to his forehead.

“Pete?” Tony asks.

“Yeah?” Peter replies.

“You’ve got flour on your cheek.” Tony says. Peter gets distracted with this comment and Tony takes a sneaky handful of flour in his right hand. “I can’t find it. Where is it?” Peter asks, clearly confused.

“Right there!” Tony cried out while chucking a handful of flour at Peter.

“Oh my god Mr Stark!” Peter says in between raspberries in attempt to get the flour out of his mouth. “That’s it!” He shouts as he grabs flour himself and chucks it straight at Tony’s face.

Tony’s face is covered in flour and he uses his right hand to clear his essential facial needs and stares at Peter. Peter stares back. They both stand like this for almost thirty seconds before Tony runs at Peter. They both run around the kitchen counter.

Peter is a giggling mess and is avoiding Tony at all cost until Tony gets him cornered in between the two counters. “I’ve got you now!” Tony laughs. “What are you going to do about it?” Peter asks. Tony only smirks and leans in close to Peter’s face, acting like he was going to give him a kiss but in reality he splatters some of the mixture over Peter’s forehead.

Peter gasps and tries to get away but Tony has a tight grip on him. “You done now?” He asks.

“Maybe.” Peter smirks. “Only maybe? or yes?” Tony asks.

“Yes.” Peter replies.

“Yes what?” Tony suggests.

“Yes sir.” Peter says cheekily.

“Hmm. Now. How about those cookies eh?” Tony says and moves over back to the counter, but not before planting a kiss on Peter’s forehead, which left cookie batter in his mouth, but hey, it didn’t taste bad.

summary: Tough guy
body:
Tough guy

Peter and Tony were out for lunch at a small diner close to Tony’s home. They were both enjoying their meal and each others company until a man, just a little older than peter (about 20-22) came up to them. Both Tony and Peter thought that it was a fan or someone who was genuinely interested in either of them at first but they were obviously mistaken when the drink that the man was holding in his hand was suddenly purred over Tony’s head.

“What the Shit!?” Tony exclaims and Peter is up in an instant, ready to pounce on the man and give him a beating but he was already running for the door by the time Peter was able to get out of his booth. This did not stop Peter though, as he ran after him with Tony pulling out some money and placing it on the booth they were eating at before following suite.

“Peter!”

Tony could see Peter chasing the bloke and could hear him yelling at him things like; “you’re gonna pay for that!” and “asshole!”

Tony, still running after Peter, stopped and decided to just wait for Peter to come back because it didn’t seem likely that the man was going to get caught. Peter put up one hell of a chase though, that’s for sure as it took a little over 5 minutes for him to make his way back to Tony.

“Bastard got away Mr Stark!” He says panting, bent over with his hands resting on his knees. “I swear if I ever meet him again, he is going to pay. I mean, why would someone do that! Wow man. I was gonna teach him a lesson.”

That sentence made Tony chuckle and he couldn’t help but reply with; “I’m digging the tough guy act, little man, but you’re too cute to fool me kid.”

“What! I totally could’ve had him!” Peter replies almost instantly in defence.

“Yes of course Pete. I don’t doubt it.” Tony states and puts a hand on Peter’s shoulder, guiding him to walk back to where they had parked at the diner.

“Tough guy act” Peter starts mumbling under his breath, “pfft, as if.”

This just makes Tony chuckle again and plant a kiss on the top of Peter’s head.

“Let’s go home.” He says, looking to Peter with a smile.

summary:
Peter: Guess I’m just too tough to cry. 
Tony: Just this morning you almost cried about snakes. 
Peter, tearing up: They don’t...
body:
Peter: Guess I’m just too tough to cry.

Tony: Just this morning you almost cried about snakes.

Peter, tearing up: They don’t have any arms!

summary: Hold My Hand
title: Hold My Hand
body:
Peter Parker X Fem Reader 

{Requested by @lovely-parker - requests are open}

Words: +1k its short 

Warnings: Mentions of hospitals, needles, memory loss, and bad grammar

Summary: Peter has an accident and doesn’t remember who you are and you try your best to not lose yourself and help the love of your life

A/n: Sorry this took so long! Im baaack!

Masterlist!

“Y/n?” you jumped awake and stood up from the extremely uncomfortable chair you’ve been sitting on for what seemed like days but in reality, was only a couple hours. You look up and meet Tony’s eyes filled with his own sorrow, you quickly wipe away the tears that stained your cheek with your sleeve before looking back at Tony with the toughest expression you could pull right now. But he saw right through everything

“H-he’s not dead is-”

“He’s okay”  He cuts you off, knowing neither of you wanted to think about that right now. You press your lips together and shut your eyes, a few tears slipping out. “I need to see him” you move around Tony quickly before he could stop you. Entering the room you see Peter sitting up on the bed awake, but with multiple tubes running into him, bandages wrapped around him and bruises on his face and body. His chest raised and fell slowly, he sat up eyebrows furrowing when he saw you enter the room.

“Peter?” you whimpered putting your hand over your mouth to keep sobs from escaping, it hurt like hell seeing him like this. He was strong you knew that, but he still needed to be helped, held, and loved, he was only a kid he shouldn’t have to deal with this crap but he refused to give it up, ‘someone has to look out for the little guy’ he would say. You wanted nothing more than to run over to him, hold him in your arms tightly and cry telling him how much of an idiot he was, but he looked at you carefully and differently causing your stomach to turn making you feel sick.

He stared at you, no fear in his eyes but he stayed like that staring at you and he opened his mouth to say something before Tony trudged into the room. He turned his head quickly looking at Tony while you still stared at Peter feeling sick to your stomach, you knew your Peter.

“Mr. Stark, whos that?” he asked glancing at you quickly

Your heart plummeted down to your stomach, your throat closing up, you wanted to break down and cry at the spot. You look over at Tony, glaring at him you breathed heavily trying to keep yourself from crying. Tony looked at you with sorrowful eyes biting the inside of his cheek, he turned looking at Peter “We’ll be right back kid” Peter nodded sitting back, Tony motioned for you to follow him and walked out of the room. Slowly walking over to the door you looked at Peter mournfully, giving him a small smile to which he returned before you walked out of the room with tears already streaming down your face with no intent of stopping.

“I-I just” you choked trying to form a sentence, but even you didn’t know what you were trying to say. Everything was wrong, every part of your body was in pain aching for the touch of the one you loved.

Tony looked at you with those same clouded mournful eyes, he placed a hand on your shoulder letting out a sigh. “He got a severe hit to the head during his- during the accident… and it causes some memory loss..”

You look up at him, salty tears covering your face you grit your teeth together trying not to break down in front of him. He shakes his head opening his arms. “You don’t have to hold back kid, come here” you instantly nod letting out a sob as you crashed into his chest, staining his expensive dress shirt in your cold tears. He wraps his arms around you, stroking your hair soothingly. “I know it hurts…”

Your whole body shook from the sobs and the pure exhaustion, you opened your eyes after a while and looked up at him. “Can I fix it? Tell me I can fix it?” your voice cracked, Tony shut his eyes at the sound of your voice making his heart sting. “There is something we can do…”

If there was even a small chance that there was something you could do to fix it, you would do it. Whatever it takes to have Peter back in your arms…to have him back to you

***

Peter watched Tony walk out of the room with the unknown girl behind him, she looked as if she was in pain? She looked at him with desperate broken eyes but smiled slightly at him, though he didn’t know who she was or where he even was, he gave her a grin back.

The door closed and he quickly started looking around the room, where am I? What happened? Is May okay? And who was that girl?

He raised an eyebrow hearing some sounds from the opposite side of the door, if Tony was here then he had to be okay. Letting out a small sigh he sank down into the bed, sitting up quickly when he heard the door open and saw Tony and the girl walk in.

Tony stood at the foot of the bed, placing a hand on Peters leg and looking at him with strained and worried eyes. All while the girl stared at the floor

“You alright Kid?” Peter quickly looks away from the girl looking at Tony

“Yeah, Im a- just a bit confused” Peter furrowed his eyebrows letting out a light chuckle, ignoring the pain that shot up his side. “Understandable, I uh- wanted to introduce you to someone quickly” Tony looked at girl, tilting his head slightly motioning towards Peter

The girl finally looked up from the ground, biting her lip she walked over to him stretching her hand out for a handshake. “My name is Y/n”

“Im Peter, but you already knew that.. sorry” he chuckled nervously, shook her hand and smiled at the pretty girl in front of him

***

You helped Tony out around the tower mostly by helping him take care of Peter. You didn’t talk to him much, mostly cause you were to scared to do anything, you lost him once and that was already too much, you couldn’t bare to lose him again.

But you both exchanged smiles when he talked to you, when he complimented your hair and blushed looking down, or when he tricked you into holding his hand. “Y/n.. I’m scared of needles.. can you um..” he looks down and blushes slightly, “Can you hold my hand?” he looks up at you with puppy eyes and almost whines

“Uh..” you set the tray of medication down and look up to still see Peter giving you his puppy eyes. “Sure Pete” you walk over to him and take his hand as he gets the shot, he looks down and smiles cheekily to himself as he squeezes your hand. You look at him and notice his smile, “Wait!”

***

After a week or so of helping with Peter it was decided that he was well enough to go back to school, it took a lot of convincing to finally make Tony give in and let him out of bed.

You were so swept away by Peter as you spent almost everyday with me, falling in love with him all over again. Lost in your own head that you forgot of all the memories that you lost with him.

You stood outside of the school waiting, where you and Peter used to meet before school, next to the birch tree that he used to call ‘Our Tree’

It wasn’t until you stood there for nearly 20 minutes that you realized he wasn’t coming, because you lost him, it hit you hard all over again. “God Im so stupid” you groaned, you felt so stupid for being so in your own head

This is real life

Reality

It hurt..but at least you still had Peter..

You look at the tree and sighed turning around to walk away before stopping in your tracks when you saw Peter standing there with a shy smile and flowers in hand. “But you- how did you..know to meet me here? Your memory?” you stuttered looking at him with wide eyes

“Uh..yeah, I uh- got my memory back the morning of the day you helped me with my shot and I asked you to hold my hand… I didn’t know how to tell you..” he smiled at you innocently,

“God damn it Peter! Y-you I was so scared! Don’t do that, I thought I lost you forever!” you almost started crying as he pulled you into his chest and kissed the top of your head, hugging you tightly “Im sorry.. I love you so much Im sorry” you shake your head letting out a choked sob before looking up at him with watery eyes, “I could kill you right now Parker”

“Hence why I brought you flowers, to uh..soften the blow?”

You chuckle lightly, shaking your head you pull him closer and kiss him softly, “I love you so much” he smiled against your lips and wrapped his arms around you. “I love you too” he mumbled and handed you the flowers, “Blow softened? Did the flowers work?” he asked grinning at you

You look at him and take the flowers carefully, “Shut up…” you smile and kiss him again, that’s your Peter

——

Let me know what you thought?

@sataninsatin @tomhollanduniverse @smexylemony @laureharrier @bilkyrie @suncitydanvers @missrobyn81 @veeshthefrog @casuallytumblingdownthestairs @crazylittlewitch @hollandechart @spiderman-n @avenirectioner @ofserien @alex–awesome–22 @softscottlang  @hollandroos @the-unicorn-store @panicatmybrain @toms-order @fantasyandfallacies @cherryblossomcharlotte @lovelyspidey @petalparker @gennyld @iaiabear

The girl finally looked up from the ground, biting her lip she walked over to him stretching her hand out for a handshake. “My name is Y/n”

“Im Peter, but you already knew that.. sorry” he chuckled nervously, shook her hand and smiled at the pretty girl in front of him

***

You helped Tony out around the tower mostly by helping him take care of Peter. You didn’t talk to him much, mostly cause you were to scared to do anything, you lost him once and that was already too much, you couldn’t bare to lose him again.

But you both exchanged smiles when he talked to you, when he complimented your hair and blushed looking down, or when he tricked you into holding his hand. “Y/n.. I’m scared of needles.. can you um..” he looks down and blushes slightly, “Can you hold my hand?” he looks up at you with puppy eyes and almost whines

“Uh..” you set the tray of medication down and look up to still see Peter giving you his puppy eyes. “Sure Pete” you walk over to him and take his hand as he gets the shot, he looks down and smiles cheekily to himself as he squeezes your hand. You look at him and notice his smile, “Wait!”

***

After a week or so of helping with Peter it was decided that he was well enough to go back to school, it took a lot of convincing to finally make Tony give in and let him out of bed.

You were so swept away by Peter as you spent almost everyday with me, falling in love with him all over again. Lost in your own head that you forgot of all the memories that you lost with him.

You stood outside of the school waiting, where you and Peter used to meet before school, next to the birch tree that he used to call ‘Our Tree’

It wasn’t until you stood there for nearly 20 minutes that you realized he wasn’t coming, because you lost him, it hit you hard all over again. “God Im so stupid” you groaned, you felt so stupid for being so in your own head

This is real life

Reality

It hurt..but at least you still had Peter..

You look at the tree and sighed turning around to walk away before stopping in your tracks when you saw Peter standing there with a shy smile and flowers in hand. “But you- how did you..know to meet me here? Your memory?” you stuttered looking at him with wide eyes

“Uh..yeah, I uh- got my memory back the morning of the day you helped me with my shot and I asked you to hold my hand… I didn’t know how to tell you..” he smiled at you innocently,

“God damn it Peter! Y-you I was so scared! Don’t do that, I thought I lost you forever!” you almost started crying as he pulled you into his chest and kissed the top of your head, hugging you tightly “Im sorry.. I love you so much Im sorry” you shake your head letting out a choked sob before looking up at him with watery eyes, “I could kill you right now Parker”

“Hence why I brought you flowers, to uh..soften the blow?”

You chuckle lightly, shaking your head you pull him closer and kiss him softly, “I love you so much” he smiled against your lips and wrapped his arms around you. “I love you too” he mumbled and handed you the flowers, “Blow softened? Did the flowers work?” he asked grinning at you

You look at him and take the flowers carefully, “Shut up…” you smile and kiss him again, that’s your Peter

——

Let me know what you thought?

trail.content:
Peter Parker X Fem Reader 

{Requested by @lovely-parker - requests are open}

Words: +1k its short 

Warnings: Mentions of hospitals, needles, memory loss, and bad grammar

Summary: Peter has an accident and doesn’t remember who you are and you try your best to not lose yourself and help the love of your life

A/n: Sorry this took so long! Im baaack!

Masterlist!

“Y/n?” you jumped awake and stood up from the extremely uncomfortable chair you’ve been sitting on for what seemed like days but in reality, was only a couple hours. You look up and meet Tony’s eyes filled with his own sorrow, you quickly wipe away the tears that stained your cheek with your sleeve before looking back at Tony with the toughest expression you could pull right now. But he saw right through everything

“H-he’s not dead is-”

“He’s okay”  He cuts you off, knowing neither of you wanted to think about that right now. You press your lips together and shut your eyes, a few tears slipping out. “I need to see him” you move around Tony quickly before he could stop you. Entering the room you see Peter sitting up on the bed awake, but with multiple tubes running into him, bandages wrapped around him and bruises on his face and body. His chest raised and fell slowly, he sat up eyebrows furrowing when he saw you enter the room.

“Peter?” you whimpered putting your hand over your mouth to keep sobs from escaping, it hurt like hell seeing him like this. He was strong you knew that, but he still needed to be helped, held, and loved, he was only a kid he shouldn’t have to deal with this crap but he refused to give it up, ‘someone has to look out for the little guy’ he would say. You wanted nothing more than to run over to him, hold him in your arms tightly and cry telling him how much of an idiot he was, but he looked at you carefully and differently causing your stomach to turn making you feel sick.

He stared at you, no fear in his eyes but he stayed like that staring at you and he opened his mouth to say something before Tony trudged into the room. He turned his head quickly looking at Tony while you still stared at Peter feeling sick to your stomach, you knew your Peter.

“Mr. Stark, whos that?” he asked glancing at you quickly

Your heart plummeted down to your stomach, your throat closing up, you wanted to break down and cry at the spot. You look over at Tony, glaring at him you breathed heavily trying to keep yourself from crying. Tony looked at you with sorrowful eyes biting the inside of his cheek, he turned looking at Peter “We’ll be right back kid” Peter nodded sitting back, Tony motioned for you to follow him and walked out of the room. Slowly walking over to the door you looked at Peter mournfully, giving him a small smile to which he returned before you walked out of the room with tears already streaming down your face with no intent of stopping.

“I-I just” you choked trying to form a sentence, but even you didn’t know what you were trying to say. Everything was wrong, every part of your body was in pain aching for the touch of the one you loved.

Tony looked at you with those same clouded mournful eyes, he placed a hand on your shoulder letting out a sigh. “He got a severe hit to the head during his- during the accident… and it causes some memory loss..”

You look up at him, salty tears covering your face you grit your teeth together trying not to break down in front of him. He shakes his head opening his arms. “You don’t have to hold back kid, come here” you instantly nod letting out a sob as you crashed into his chest, staining his expensive dress shirt in your cold tears. He wraps his arms around you, stroking your hair soothingly. “I know it hurts…”

Your whole body shook from the sobs and the pure exhaustion, you opened your eyes after a while and looked up at him. “Can I fix it? Tell me I can fix it?” your voice cracked, Tony shut his eyes at the sound of your voice making his heart sting. “There is something we can do…”

If there was even a small chance that there was something you could do to fix it, you would do it. Whatever it takes to have Peter back in your arms…to have him back to you

***

Peter watched Tony walk out of the room with the unknown girl behind him, she looked as if she was in pain? She looked at him with desperate broken eyes but smiled slightly at him, though he didn’t know who she was or where he even was, he gave her a grin back.

The door closed and he quickly started looking around the room, where am I? What happened? Is May okay? And who was that girl?

He raised an eyebrow hearing some sounds from the opposite side of the door, if Tony was here then he had to be okay. Letting out a small sigh he sank down into the bed, sitting up quickly when he heard the door open and saw Tony and the girl walk in.

Tony stood at the foot of the bed, placing a hand on Peters leg and looking at him with strained and worried eyes. All while the girl stared at the floor

“You alright Kid?” Peter quickly looks away from the girl looking at Tony

“Yeah, Im a- just a bit confused” Peter furrowed his eyebrows letting out a light chuckle, ignoring the pain that shot up his side. “Understandable, I uh- wanted to introduce you to someone quickly” Tony looked at girl, tilting his head slightly motioning towards Peter

The girl finally looked up from the ground, biting her lip she walked over to him stretching her hand out for a handshake. “My name is Y/n”

“Im Peter, but you already knew that.. sorry” he chuckled nervously, shook her hand and smiled at the pretty girl in front of him

***

You helped Tony out around the tower mostly by helping him take care of Peter. You didn’t talk to him much, mostly cause you were to scared to do anything, you lost him once and that was already too much, you couldn’t bare to lose him again.

But you both exchanged smiles when he talked to you, when he complimented your hair and blushed looking down, or when he tricked you into holding his hand. “Y/n.. I’m scared of needles.. can you um..” he looks down and blushes slightly, “Can you hold my hand?” he looks up at you with puppy eyes and almost whines

“Uh..” you set the tray of medication down and look up to still see Peter giving you his puppy eyes. “Sure Pete” you walk over to him and take his hand as he gets the shot, he looks down and smiles cheekily to himself as he squeezes your hand. You look at him and notice his smile, “Wait!”

***

After a week or so of helping with Peter it was decided that he was well enough to go back to school, it took a lot of convincing to finally make Tony give in and let him out of bed.

You were so swept away by Peter as you spent almost everyday with me, falling in love with him all over again. Lost in your own head that you forgot of all the memories that you lost with him.

You stood outside of the school waiting, where you and Peter used to meet before school, next to the birch tree that he used to call ‘Our Tree’

It wasn’t until you stood there for nearly 20 minutes that you realized he wasn’t coming, because you lost him, it hit you hard all over again. “God Im so stupid” you groaned, you felt so stupid for being so in your own head

This is real life

Reality

It hurt..but at least you still had Peter..

You look at the tree and sighed turning around to walk away before stopping in your tracks when you saw Peter standing there with a shy smile and flowers in hand. “But you- how did you..know to meet me here? Your memory?” you stuttered looking at him with wide eyes

“Uh..yeah, I uh- got my memory back the morning of the day you helped me with my shot and I asked you to hold my hand… I didn’t know how to tell you..” he smiled at you innocently,

“God damn it Peter! Y-you I was so scared! Don’t do that, I thought I lost you forever!” you almost started crying as he pulled you into his chest and kissed the top of your head, hugging you tightly “Im sorry.. I love you so much Im sorry” you shake your head letting out a choked sob before looking up at him with watery eyes, “I could kill you right now Parker”

“Hence why I brought you flowers, to uh..soften the blow?”

You chuckle lightly, shaking your head you pull him closer and kiss him softly, “I love you so much” he smiled against your lips and wrapped his arms around you. “I love you too” he mumbled and handed you the flowers, “Blow softened? Did the flowers work?” he asked grinning at you

You look at him and take the flowers carefully, “Shut up…” you smile and kiss him again, that’s your Peter

——

Let me know what you thought?
